description.jp: ０組の指揮隊長かつ指導教官。かつて朱雀四天王の一人としてその名を轟かせ 氷魔法を得意とすることから「氷剣の死神」と畏怖された男。冷血漢と誤解されることもあるが胸の内には熱さと優しさを秘めており教え子たちを静かに見守っている。
description.gl: Class Zero's commanding officer and academic advisor. Once celebrated as one of the Four Champions of Rubrum, he is known as the Ice Reaper, his attacks literally sending chills down his enemies' spines. Though appearing coldhearted on the surface, he truly cares about his students and quietly watches over them.

jp.text: クリスタルの加護あれ
とうの昔に氷剣の死神は死んだ。\nだが、まだできることもある
お前たちの魂には\n無限の可能性があった\nそのお前たちが選んだ道だ
それは当てつけか？ 反抗期か？\nモーグリのモノマネか？
お前たちがいないと 少々 張り合いがないようだ

gl.text: I am no longer the Ice Reaper of old. Still、 I'm not completely useless.
Your souls had infinite possibilities、 and now you've all chosen your path.
What's Akademeia's policy on food in class?
However、 I also admit having you lot around keeps me on my toes.

desc.gl:
10-hit group Ice melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
Deals total HP damage to each target
All targets: 6 turns 5 levels of Hyōrō (limit 5)
Self: 12 turns Warm Gaze
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)

While Warm Gaze active:
 • Increases party's BRV damage dealt when attacking elemental weakness
 • Further increases own BRV damage dealt when attacking elemental weakness

Hyōrō level increases by 1 after afflicted target's turn up to 5; returns to level 1 from level 5 after target's turn
desc.jp:
10HIT氷属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃

与えるHPダメージは等倍

自身に12ACTION「温かな眼差し」付与
使用後 次の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない
（一部のアビリティを除く）

味方全員の属性弱点攻撃BRV威力が上昇し自身の効果はさらに上昇
